title: Resolution bug
body:
Is the league game client suppose to be this small?
When ever I change the res its back like this next game and the full screen mode does not work I tried the repair option but that did not work. What should I do{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
I sometimes make the resolution small like this when I want to spectate a match while doing other things.  You should be able to change this in-game via the Video options.  There should be a drop down to increase the resolution, as well as full screen.  

Now, if they're not saving then there might be a problem with your files syncing properly to our servers.  To resolve this, enter a custom game.  While in this game, navigate to your League installation folder ( C:\Riot Games\League of Legends).

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Hopefully, this gets you sync'd up!
